HelmCharts.Name: udm
HelmCharts.Values:
#
# Default values for UDM.
# This is a YAML-formatted file.
# Declare variables to be passed into your templates.
#

# Activation of sub-charts based on tags.
tags:
  nudm-sdm: true
  nudm-uecm: true
  nudm-ee: true
  nudm-ueau: true
  nudm-notify: true
  nudm-li-tf: false
  nudm-li-poi: false
  cmod: true
  nudm-sdm-reg: true
  nudm-uecm-reg: true
  nudm-ee-reg: true
  nudm-ueau-reg: true
  hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-ee: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-notify: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-sdm: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-ueau: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-uecm: false


############# Activation of Nudm-notify NF.############
nudm-notify:
  enabled: true

  # Other deployment-related settings
  replicas: 1
  # Optional name override
  nameOverride: nudm-notify

 # Service resource quotas (optional, but recommended)
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  #image:
  #  repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
  #  pullPolicy: Always
  
  # Service port exposure
  service:
    serviceMeshEnabled: false
    type: NodePort
    port: 8443
    extPort: 30097
    # change to http if sdm service to brought up without security
    scheme: https
          
  # NRF registration agent service-specific settings
  nrfRegistration:
    nfProfile:
      nfInstanceId: 0590E150-4C69-4d86-A49C-990BF056F995
      plmnList: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      fqdn: localhost
      ipv4Address: 127.0.0.1
      # slice information . Sampleformat '{"sst":123,"sd":"19CDE0"}, {"sst":124,"sd":"19CDE0"}'
      #sNssais: 
      #capacity:
      nfService:
        nfServiceInstanceId: UDM-NOTIFY-HPE
        apiVersionUri: v2
        apiFullVersion: 2.0.2
        # scheme is http or https, provide this value if service has to be registered with proxy address and scheme
        # scheme:https
        #
        # This port value should hold NF service port for extrenal access.
        # Configure this value only if NF service has to be registered with ingress proxy port.
        # port:8443
        #
        # capacity:


  # NRF discovery service - NRF address
  #nnrfClient:
    
  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0

  # Service features 
  features:
    subsToNotifyCallback: &SubsToNotifyUri https://localhost.com:8080/nudm-notify/v1/notify/sendNotification
    notifyThreadPoolSize: 50

  # Application logic configuration (the only part which depends on the NF service)
  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/notify"
    application: nudm-notify-nf-config.yaml

  ##### HTTP Server config #####
  # Threads tuning (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
  threads:
    ioThreads: 4
    workerThreads: 128

  httpServer:
      https:
        # HTTP tuning here (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
        http2InitialWindowSize:
        http2MaxConcurrentStreams:
        http2MaxFrameSize:
        noRequestTimeout: 
        # This targets an entry in "security > sslContexts"
        sslContext: "ctx1"

   # HTTP sever security (TLS) here with key stores
  security:
    sslContexts:
      ctx1:
        protocols: "TLSv1.2"
        keyStore: "store1"
    keyStores:
      store1:
        # Keystore path and type are optional, there is default location and type default is PKCS12
        path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/notify/security/keystore.jks"
        type: "JKS"
        # should be a location to a secret, but Thorntail requires it
        password: "password"

  # Debug traces
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO

 # Remote cache servers (if any)
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-provider"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-cache-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            # Enable below section if 'nudm-notify.nrf.enableCache' is set to 'true'.
            #- name: "nnrf-client-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "java.lang.String"
            #  eternal: "true"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://localhost:6379?database=1&timeout=1000"
            #    cache.codec: "io.lettuce.core.codec.StringCodec"
                    
#  logging: {}

#  statistics: {}

#  calltracing: {}




############# Activation of Nudm-sdm NF.############
nudm-sdm:
  enabled: true

  # Other deployment-related settings
  replicas: 1

  # Optional name override
  nameOverride: nudm-sdm

  # Service resource quotas (optional, but recommended)
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  #image:
  #  repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
  #  pullPolicy: Always

  # Service port exposure
  service:
    serviceMeshEnabled: false
    type: NodePort
    port: 8443
    extPort: 30093
    # change to http if sdm service to brought up without security
    scheme: https

  # NRF registration agent service-specific settings
  nrfRegistration:
    nfProfile:
      nfInstanceId: 0590E150-4C69-4d86-A49C-990BF056F991
      plmnList: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      fqdn: localhost
      ipv4Address: 127.0.0.1
      heartBeatTimer: 45
      # slice information . Sampleformat '{"sst":123,"sd":"19CDE0"}, {"sst":124,"sd":"19CDE0"}'
      #sNssais:
      #capacity:
      nfService:
        nfServiceInstanceId: UDM-SDM-HPE
        apiVersionUri: v2
        apiFullVersion: 2.0.2
        # scheme is http or https, provide this value if service has to be registered with proxy address and scheme
        # scheme:https
        #
        # This port value should hold NF service port for extrenal access.
        # Configure this value only if NF service has to be registered with ingress proxy port.
        # port:8443
        #
        # capacity:

  # Provide NRF server IP/Port/scheme value for NRF discovery service
  #nnrfClient:

  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0
    
  #nudm-sdm service features related parameter  
  features:
    multiDataSetSupport: true
    operatorPolicyForSharedData: SendSubscriptionDataWithSharedData
    subsToNotifyCallbackUri: *SubsToNotifyUri
    sdmSubscribeInUdr: true
    amfRegMonitorInUDR: true
    odbMonitorInUDR: false
    multipleHplmnEnabled: false
    
  # Application logic configuration (the only part which depends on the NF service)
  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/sdm"
    application: nudm-sdm-nf-config.yaml

  ##### HTTP Server config #####
  # Threads tuning (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
  threads:
    ioThreads: 4
    workerThreads: 128
    
  httpServer:
      https:
        # HTTP tuning here (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
        http2InitialWindowSize:
        http2MaxConcurrentStreams:
        http2MaxFrameSize:
        noRequestTimeout: 
        # This targets an entry in "security > sslContexts"
        sslContext: "ctx1"
  
  security:
    sslContexts:
      ctx1:
        protocols: "TLSv1.2"
        keyStore: "store1"
    keyStores:
      store1:
        # Keystore path and type are optional, there is default location and type default is PKCS12
        path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/sdm/security/keystore.jks"
        type: "JKS"
        # should be a location to a secret, but Thorntail requires it
        password: "password"
  
 # Debug traces
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO
  
  # Remote cache servers (if any)
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-provider"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-cache-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            # Enable below section if 'nudm-sdm.nrf.enableCache' is set to 'true'.
            #- name: "nnrf-client-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "java.lang.String"
            #  eternal: "true"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://localhost:6379?database=1&timeout=1000"
            #    cache.codec: "io.lettuce.core.codec.StringCodec"
#  logging: {}
#  statistics: {}
#  calltracing: {}


############# Activation of Nudm-uecm NF.############
nudm-uecm:
  enabled: true
  
  # Other deployment-related settings
  replicas: 1
  
  # Optional name override
  nameOverride: nudm-uecm
  
  # Service resource quotas (optional, but recommended)
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  #image:
  #  repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
  #  pullPolicy: Always
  
  # Service port exposure
  service:
    serviceMeshEnabled: false
    type: NodePort
    port: 8443
    extPort: 30094
    # change to http if sdm service to brought up without security
    scheme: https
  
  # NRF registration agent service-specific settings
  nrfRegistration:
    nfProfile:
      nfInstanceId: 0590E150-4C69-4d86-A49C-990BF056F992
      plmnList: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      ipv4Address: 127.0.0.1
      fqdn: localhost
      heartBeatTimer: 45
      # slice information . Sampleformat '{"sst":123,"sd":"19CDE0"}, {"sst":124,"sd":"19CDE0"}'
      #sNssais:
      #capacity:
      allowedPlmns: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      # allowedNfDomains is a Patten . Sample '".","."'
      #allowedNfDomains:
      nfService:
        nfServiceInstanceId: UDM-UECM-HPE
        apiVersionUri: v1
        apiFullVersion: 1.0.2
        # scheme is http or https, provide this value if service has to be registered with proxy address and scheme
        # scheme:https
        #
        # This port value should hold NF service port for extrenal access.
        # Configure this value only if NF service has to be registered with ingress proxy port.
        # port:8443
        #
        #capacity:
      
  # NRF server address used for NRF discovery
  #nnrfClient:
    
  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0
    
  # nudm-uecm service related feature flags
  features:
    eeEnabled: false
    odbDataCheckEnabled: false
    operatorPolicyForSharedData:
      registration: AllowedWithSharedData
    liEnbld: false
  
  # Application logic configuration (the only part which depends on the NF service  
  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/uecm"
    application: nudm-uecm-nf-config.yaml
    
  # Debug traces
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO


  ##### HTTP Server config #####
  # Threads tuning (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
  threads:
    ioThreads: 4
    workerThreads: 128
    
  httpServer:
      https:
        # HTTP tuning here (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
        http2InitialWindowSize:
        http2MaxConcurrentStreams:
        http2MaxFrameSize:
        noRequestTimeout: 
        # This targets an entry in "security > sslContexts"
        sslContext: "ctx1"
  # HTTP sever security (TLS) here with key stores
  security:
    sslContexts:
      ctx1:
        protocols: "TLSv1.2"
        keyStore: "store1"
    keyStores:
      store1:
        # Keystore path and type are optional, there is default location and type default is PKCS12
        path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/uecm/security/keystore.jks"
        type: "JKS"
        # should be a location to a secret, but Thorntail requires it
        password: "password"

 # Remote cache servers (if any)
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-provider"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-cache-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            # Enable below section if 'udm-uecm.nrf.enableCache' is set to 'true'.
            #- name: "nnrf-client-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "java.lang.String"
            #  eternal: "true"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://localhost:6379?database=1&timeout=1000"
            #    cache.codec: "io.lettuce.core.codec.StringCodec"

  kafka:
    details: 10.233.3.53:9092
    groupId: UDMMsgConsumerGroup
    maxBlock: 1000
    servingSystemMsgQueueTopicName: UDMServingSystem
 
#  statistics: {}

#  calltracing: {}

#  logging: {}


############# Activation of Nudm-ee NF.############
nudm-ee:
  enabled: true
  
  # Other deployment-related settings
  replicas: 1
  
  # Optional name override
  nameOverride: nudm-ee
  
  eeSubscirpionExpiryDuration: 172800
  
  # Service resource quotas (optional, but recommended)
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  #image:
  #  repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
  #  pullPolicy: Always
  
   # Service port exposure
  service:
    serviceMeshEnabled: false
    type: NodePort
    port: 8443
    extPort: 30095
    # change to http if sdm service to brought up without security
    scheme: https      
      
  # NRF registration agent service-specific settings
  nrfRegistration:
    nfProfile:
      nfInstanceId: 0590E150-4C69-4d86-A49C-990BF056F994
      plmnList: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      ipv4Address: 127.0.0.1
      fqdn: localhost
      heartBeatTimer: 45
      # slice information . Sampleformat '{"sst":123,"sd":"19CDE0"}, {"sst":124,"sd":"19CDE0"}'
      #sNssais:
      #capacity:
      nfService:
        nfServiceInstanceId: UDM-EE-HPE
        apiVersionUri: v1
        apiFullVersion: 1.0.2

        # scheme is http or https, provide this value if service has to be registered with proxy address and scheme
        # scheme:https
        #
        # This port value should hold NF service port for extrenal access.
        # Configure this value only if NF service has to be registered with ingress proxy port.
        # port:8443
        #
        #capacity:

  # NRF server address used for NRF discovery 
  #nnrfClient:

  
  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0

    
  # Application logic configuration (the only part which depends on the NF service)
  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/ee"
    application: nudm-ee-nf-config.yaml
    

  # Debug traces
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO


  ##### HTTP Server config #####
  # Threads tuning (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
  threads:
    ioThreads: 4
    workerThreads: 128
    
  httpServer:
      https:
        # HTTP tuning here (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
        http2InitialWindowSize:
        http2MaxConcurrentStreams:
        http2MaxFrameSize:
        noRequestTimeout: 
        # This targets an entry in "security > sslContexts"
        sslContext: "ctx1"
  
  security:
    sslContexts:
      ctx1:
        protocols: "TLSv1.2"
        keyStore: "store1"
    keyStores:
      store1:
        # Keystore path and type are optional, there is default location and type default is PKCS12
        path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/ee/security/keystore.jks"
        type: "JKS"
        # should be a location to a secret, but Thorntail requires it
        password: "password"


#  calltracing: {}

#  logging: {}

  # Remote cache servers (if any)
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-provider"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-cache-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            # Enable below section if 'nudm-ee.nrf.enableCache' is set to 'true'.
            #- name: "nnrf-client-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "java.lang.String"
            #  eternal: "true"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://localhost:6379?database=1&timeout=1000"
            #    cache.codec: "io.lettuce.core.codec.StringCodec"


############ CMOD ############
# port can be override if two CMOD PODs are deployed both for AUSF and UEAU in same cluster
# enabled flag can be false, if UEAU and AUSF deployed together, they share same POD
cmod:
  enabled: true
  nameOverride: cmod
  #image:
  #   repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
  #   pullPolicy: Always


############# Activation of Nudm-ueau NF############
nudm-ueau:
  enabled: true
  
  # Other deployment-related settings
  replicas: 1
  
  # Optional name override
  nameOverride: nudm-ueau
  
  # Service resource quotas (optional, but recommended)
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  #image:
    #repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
    #pullPolicy: Always
    
  # Service port exposure
  service:
    serviceMeshEnabled: false
    type: NodePort
    port: 8443
    extPort: 30096
    # change to http if sdm service to brought up without security
    scheme: https      
      
  nrfRegistration:
    nfProfile:
      nfInstanceId: 0590E150-4C69-4d86-A49C-990BF056F993
      plmnList: '{"mcc":111,"mnc":222}, {"mcc":111,"mnc":333}'
      ipv4Address: 127.0.0.1
      fqdn: localhost
      heartBeatTimer: 45
      # slice information . Sampleformat '{"sst":123,"sd":"19CDE0"}, {"sst":124,"sd":"19CDE0"}'
      #sNssais:
      #capacity:
      nfService:
        nfServiceInstanceId: UDM-UEAU-HPE
        apiVersionUri: v1
        apiFullVersion: 1.0.1
        # scheme is http or https, provide this value if service has to be registered with proxy address and scheme
        # scheme:https
        #
        # This port value should hold NF service port for extrenal access.
        # Configure this value only if NF service has to be registered with ingress proxy port.
        # port:8443
        #
        #capacity:
  
  #Provide NRF server hostname  value for NRF discovery service
  #nnrfClient:

  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0
  
  ueau_cmod:
    serviceaddr: cmod
    port: 8060
  persistentVolume:
    enabled: false
    
  # Application logic configuration (the only part which depends on the NF service)  
  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/ueau"
    application: nudm-ueau-nf-config.yaml

  # Debug traces
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO


  ##### HTTP Server config #####
  # Threads tuning (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
  threads:
    ioThreads: 4
    workerThreads: 128
    
  httpServer:
      https:
        # HTTP tuning here (optional, but default values may not be suitable for perfs)
        http2InitialWindowSize:
        http2MaxConcurrentStreams:
        http2MaxFrameSize:
        noRequestTimeout: 
        # This targets an entry in "security > sslContexts"
        sslContext: "ctx1"
        
  # HTTP sever security (TLS) here with key stores
  security:
    sslContexts:
      ctx1:
        protocols: "TLSv1.2"
        keyStore: "store1"
    keyStores:
      store1:
        # Keystore path and type are optional, there is default location and type default is PKCS12
        path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/ueau/security/keystore.jks"
        type: "JKS"
        # should be a location to a secret, but Thorntail requires it
        password: "password"

  etcd:
    clientPort: 2379
    serviceName: etcd

  # Remote cache servers (if any)
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-provider"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-cache-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            # Enable below section if 'nudm-ueau.nrf.enableCache' is set to 'true'.
            #- name: "nnrf-client-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "java.lang.String"
            #  eternal: "true"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://localhost:6379?database=1&timeout=1000"
            #    cache.codec: "io.lettuce.core.codec.StringCodec"
            
#  calltracing: {}

#  statistics: {}

#  logging: {}


############# Activation of Nudm-li-tf NF ############
nudm-li-tf:
  enabled: false
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-li-tf
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi
  image:
    name: hpe-nf-udm-li-tf
    repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
    tag: latest
    pullPolicy: Always

  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/li-tf"
    application: nudm-li-tf-nf-config.yaml
   
  restClient:
    connector-provider: com.hpe.paas.middleware.jersey.okhttp.connector.OkhttpConnectorProvider
    extractClientServicNameApiVersion: false
    properties:
      jersey.config.client.async.threadPoolSize: 10
      jersey.config.client.connectTimeout: 100
      jersey.config.client.readTimeout: 100
    
  statistics:
    enabled: true
    http-server-enabled: true
    http-client-enabled: true
    jvm-metrics: true
    extractServerServicNameApiVersion: false
    properties:
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.host: "influxdb-influxdb"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.port: "8086"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.protocol: "http"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.database: "nflitf"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.polling.interval: 10
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.publish.jsonDescriptors: true      
    jmx:
      enabled: true
      domain: "Nnef_UDM_LiTf"
      properties:
        com.hpe.imsc.statistics.jmx.descriptors: "true"
        com.hpe.imsc.statistics.jmx.notifications: "true" 
    
  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-manager"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-caching-manager"
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            - name: "simple-redis-cache"
              keyType: "java.lang.String"
              valueType: "java.lang.String"
              eternal: "true"
              writeThrough: "false"
              readThrough: "false"
              properties:
                cache.uri: "redis://redis-master.utils.svc.cluster.local:6380?database=0"
                cache.codec: "com.hpe.cms5g.udm.li.common.utils.TFEncryptionCodec"    
                cache.connect: false
                cache.passwordfile: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/li-tf/security/cache-password.txt"
     
  schemaValidation:
    version: v1.6.1
    deliveryType: X2Only
    enableKeepAlive: true
   
  keepAlive:
    TIME_P2: 60
    
  dataEncryption:
    dataSecret: VU5JWjVBQkNENjc4OTBFRg==
    keySecret: secureMe
    
  security:
    keystorePassword: password
    cryptoProtocol: TLSv1.2
    truststorePassword: password
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO
  logging:
    locale: en-US
    loggers:
      - name: log4j2
        factory-class: com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.logging.log4j.Log4j2I18nLoggerFactoryImpl

  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    httpPort: 8080
    extHttpsPort: 30673
    scheme: https

  healthCheck:
    port: 8080
    initialDelaySeconds: 60
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 10

  customize:
    swarm:
     undertow: {}
     fullFractions: {}

  call_tracing: {}

  persistentVolume:
    enabled: false

  fullnameOverride: ""

  ingress:
    enabled: false
    annotations: {}
    paths: []
    hosts:
    tls: []

  nodeSelector: {}

  tolerations: []

  affinity: {}

  extraEnv: []

############# Activation of Nudm-li-poi NF ############
nudm-li-poi:
  enabled: false
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-li-poi
  resources:
    requests:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 512Mi
    limits:
      cpu: 1000m
      memory: 2048Mi

  image:
    name: hpe-nf-udm-li-poi
    repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
    tag: latest
    pullPolicy: Always

  config:
    uriPath:
      scheme: "file"
      authority: "//"
      path: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/li-poi"
    application: nudm-li-poi-nf-config.yaml
    
  restClient:
    connector-provider: com.hpe.paas.middleware.jersey.netty.connector.Http2NettyConnectorProvider
    extractClientServicNameApiVersion: false
    properties:
      jersey.config.client.async.threadPoolSize: 10
      jersey.config.client.connectTimeout: 100
      jersey.config.client.readTimeout: 100
  
  statistics:
    enabled: true
    pubsub-publisher-enabled: false
    pubsub-subscriber-enabled: true
    extractServerServicNameApiVersion: false
    jvm-metrics: true
    properties:
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.host: "influxdb-influxdb"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.port: "8086"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.protocol: "http"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.database: "nflipoi"
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.influxdb.server.polling.interval: 10 
      com.hpe.imsc.statistics.publish.jsonDescriptors: true      
    jmx:
      enabled: true
      domain: "Nnef_UDM_LiPoi"
      properties:
        com.hpe.imsc.statistics.jmx.descriptors: "true"
        com.hpe.imsc.statistics.jmx.notifications: "true" 

  caching:
    - uri: "paas://redis-caching-manager"
      classloader: "#notused"
      properties:
        caching.provider.class.name: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.cache.redis.RedisCachingProvider"
      cache-managers:
        - uri: "paas://redis-caching-manager" 
          classloader: "#notused"
          properties:
          caches:
            - name: "simple-redis-cache"
              keyType: "java.lang.String"
              valueType: "java.lang.String"
              eternal: "true"
              writeThrough: "false"
              readThrough: "false"
              properties:
                cache.uri: "redis://redis-master.utils.svc.cluster.local:6380?database=0"
                cache.codec: "com.hpe.cms5g.udm.li.common.utils.TFEncryptionCodec"
                cache.connect: false
                cache.passwordfile: "/etc/opt/hpe/nf/udm/li-poi/security/cache-password.txt"
            #- name: "json-redis-cache"
            #  keyType: "java.lang.String"
            #  valueType: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.config.jaxb.CommonNfConfig"
            #  eternal: "false"
            #  writeThrough: "false"
            #  readThrough: "false"
            #  timeToLiveSeconds: "10"
            #  properties:
            #    cache.uri: "redis://10.233.32.185:6379?database=1"
            #    cache.codec: "com.hpe.paas.middleware.utils.redis.JsonRedisCodec"

  kafka:
    details: kafka.utils.svc.cluster.local:9092
    topicName: UDMServingSystem
    groupId: UDMMsgConsumerGroup
  
  dataEncryption:
    dataSecret: VU5JWjVBQkNENjc4OTBFRg==
    keySecret: secureMe

  security:
    keystorePassword: password
    cryptoProtocol: TLSv1.2
    timeout: 3000  # in milliseconds
    
  debug:
    rootLogger:
      level: INFO
    loggers:
      "stdout":
        level: INFO
        handlers:
          - STDOUT
      "com.hpe":
        level: INFO
      "io.undertow":
        level: INFO
      "io.netty":
        level: INFO
      "okhttp3":
        level: INFO
      "org.jboss.as":
        level: INFO
      "org.wildfly":
        level: INFO
  logging:
    locale: en-US
    loggers:
      - name: log4j2
        factory-class: com.hpe.paas.middleware.sdk.impl.logging.log4j.Log4j2I18nLoggerFactoryImpl

  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    httpPort: 8080
    extHttpsPort: 30573
    scheme: https

  healthCheck:
    port: 8080
    initialDelaySeconds: 60
    periodSeconds: 10
    timeoutSeconds: 10

  customize:
    swarm:
      undertow: {}
      fullFractions: {}

  call_tracing: {}

  persistentVolume:
    enabled: false

  fullnameOverride: ""

  ingress:
    enabled: false
    annotations: {}
    paths: []
    hosts:
    tls: []

  resources: {}

  nodeSelector: {}

  tolerations: []

  affinity: {}

  extraEnv: []



############ Activation of Nudm-SDM-Registration service ############
nudm-sdm-reg:
  # Flag for enabling NRF registration
  enabled: true
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-sdm-reg
  #DO NOT change this value unless sdm service name is changed
  configMapShared: "nudm-sdm"
  image:
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    extHttpsPort: 30053
    healthCheckPort: 8080
  #Provide NRF server IP/Port/scheme value for NRF registration service
  nnrfClient:
    serverScheme: https
    serverFqdn: 127.0.0.1
    serverPort: 9990

############ Activation of Nudm-UECM-Registration service ############
nudm-uecm-reg:
  # Flag for enabling NRF registration
  enabled: true
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-uecm-reg
  #DO NOT change this value unless uecm service name is changed
  configMapShared: "nudm-uecm"
  image:
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    extHttpsPort: 30054
    healthCheckPort: 8080
  #Provide NRF server IP/Port/scheme value for NRF registration service
  nnrfClient:
    serverScheme: https
    serverFqdn: 127.0.0.1
    serverPort: 9990

############ Activation of Nudm-EE-Registration service ############
nudm-ee-reg:
  # Flag for enabling NRF registration
  enabled: true
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-ee-reg
  #DO NOT change this value unless ee service name is changed
  configMapShared: "nudm-ee"
  image:
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    extHttpsPort: 30055
    healthCheckPort: 8080
  #Provide NRF server IP/Port/scheme value for NRF registration service
  nnrfClient:
    serverScheme: https
    serverFqdn: 127.0.0.1
    serverPort: 9990

############ Activation of Nudm-UEAU-Registration service ############
nudm-ueau-reg:
  # Flag for enabling NRF registration
  enabled: true
  replicas: 1
  nameOverride: nudm-ueau-reg
  #DO NOT change this value unless ueau service name is changed
  configMapShared: "nudm-ueau"
  image:
    pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
  service:
    type: NodePort
    httpsPort: 8443
    extHttpsPort: 30056
    healthCheckPort: 8080
  #Provide NRF server IP/Port/scheme value for NRF registration service
  nnrfClient:
    serverScheme: https
    serverFqdn: 127.0.0.1
    serverPort: 9990

############ HPA Config for nudm : nudm-ee ############
hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-ee:
  enabled: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-cpu:
    enabled: true
    nf:
      deployment: hpe-nf-udm-nudm-ee
    hpa:
      minReplicas: 1
      maxReplicas: 5
      cpuThreshold: 70

############ HPA Config for nudm : nudm-notify ############
hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-notify:
  enabled: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-cpu:
    enabled: true
    nf:
      deployment: hpe-nf-udm-nudm-notify
    hpa:
      minReplicas: 1
      maxReplicas: 5
      cpuThreshold: 70

############ HPA Config for nudm : nudm-sdm ############

hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-sdm:
  enabled: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-cpu:
    enabled: true
    nf:
      deployment: hpe-nf-udm-nudm-sdm
    hpa:
      minReplicas: 1
      maxReplicas: 5
      cpuThreshold: 70

############ HPA Config for nudm : nudm-ueau ############

hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-ueau:
  enabled: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-cpu:
    enabled: true
    nf:
      deployment: hpe-nf-udm-nudm-ueau
    hpa:
      minReplicas: 1
      maxReplicas: 5
      cpuThreshold: 70

############ HPA Config for nudm : nudm-uecm ############
hpe-sf-hpa-nudm-uecm:
  enabled: false
  hpe-sf-hpa-cpu:
    enabled: true
    nf:
      deployment: hpe-nf-udm-nudm-uecm
    hpa:
      minReplicas: 1
      maxReplicas: 5
      cpuThreshold: 70


# Global values section, seen by all subcharts.

global:
  # Common JVM options, could be shared by all Java-based NFs.
  javaOpts: "-Xms512m -Xmx512m -Djava.net.preferIPv4Stack=true "
  image:
    repository: cmsgvm38.gre.hpecorp.net:18444
    pullPolicy: Always
    
  calltracing:
    agent:  jaeger-agent
    agentPort: 6831
    endpoint: "https://jaeger-collector:14268/api/traces"
    enabled: true
    traceAllOperations: true
    traceAllUEs: false
    maxTraceDepth: "MINIMUM"
    maxBodyLength: 1200
    autorefreshProvisioningPeriod: 30
    
  logging:
    # TCP, host:port
    fluentdServer: fluentd.logging:24224
  
  
  statistics:
    # protocol://host:port
    influxdbServer: http://influxdb-service.metrics:8086
    database: "nudm-nf"
    period: 10
    jvmMetrics: true

  nrf:
    server: https://nrf.server.hpecorp.net:8443
    # NRF API version for nnrf-mfn and nnrf-disc, as it appears in the API URL
    apiVersion: v1
    enableCache: false
    defaultCacheValidityPeriodSecs: 3600
    discoverStubMode: false
      
  # UDR address if UDR is direct discovery and not through NRF
  udrNfProfile:
    ipv4Addresses: 127.0.0.1
    port: 5090
    scheme: https
    apiVersionUri: v1
    apiFullVersion: 1.0.0

HelmCharts.Name: telegraf-old
HelmCharts.Values:
## Default values.yaml for Telegraf
## This is a YAML-formatted file.
## ref: https://hub.docker.com/r/library/telegraf/tags/

replicaCount: 1

image:
  repo: "telegraf"
  tag: "1.14-alpine"
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

podAnnotations: {}

imagePullSecrets: []

env:
  - name: HOSTNAME
    value: "telegraf-polling-service"

# An older "volumeMounts" key was previously added which will likely
# NOT WORK as you expect. Please use this newer configuration.

# volumes:
# - name: telegraf-output-influxdb2
#   configMap:
#     name: "telegraf-output-influxdb2"
# mountPoints:
# - name: telegraf-output-influxdb2
#   mountPath: /etc/telegraf/conf.d
#   subPath: influxdb2.conf


## Configure resource requests and limits
## ref: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/compute-resources/
resources: {}
  # requests:
  #   memory: 128Mi
  #   cpu: 100m
  # limits:
  #   memory: 128Mi
  #   cpu: 100m

## Node labels for pod assignment
## ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/node-selection/
nodeSelector: {}

service:
  enabled: true
  type: ClusterIP
  annotations: {}

rbac:
  # Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created
  create: true
  # Create only for the release namespace or cluster wide (Role vs ClusterRole)
  clusterWide: false
  # Rules for the created rule
  rules: []
# When using the prometheus input to scrape all pods you need extra rules set to the ClusterRole to be
# able to scan the pods for scraping labels. The following rules have been taken from:
# https://github.com/helm/charts/blob/master/stable/prometheus/templates/server-clusterrole.yaml#L8-L46
#    - apiGroups:
#        - ""
#      resources:
#        - nodes
#        - nodes/proxy
#        - nodes/metrics
#        - services
#        - endpoints
#        - pods
#        - ingresses
#        - configmaps
#      verbs:
#        - get
#        - list
#        - watch
#    - apiGroups:
#        - "extensions"
#      resources:
#        - ingresses/status
#        - ingresses
#      verbs:
#        - get
#        - list
#        - watch
#    - nonResourceURLs:
#        - "/metrics"
#      verbs:
#        - get

serviceAccount:
  # Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created
  create: true
  # The name of the ServiceAccount to use.
  # If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template
  name:

## Exposed telegraf configuration
## For full list of possible values see `/docs/all-config-values.yaml` and `/docs/all-config-values.toml`
## ref: https://docs.influxdata.com/telegraf/v1.1/administration/configuration/
config:
  agent:
    interval: "10s"
    round_interval: true
    metric_batch_size: 1000
    metric_buffer_limit: 10000
    collection_jitter: "0s"
    flush_interval: "10s"
    flush_jitter: "0s"
    precision: ""
    debug: false
    quiet: false
    logfile: ""
    hostname: "$HOSTNAME"
    omit_hostname: false
  processors:
    - enum:
        mapping:
          field: "status"
          dest: "status_code"
          value_mappings:
            healthy: 1
            problem: 2
            critical: 3
  outputs:
    - influxdb:
        urls:
          - "http://influxdb.monitoring.svc:8086"
        database: "telegraf"
  inputs:
    - statsd:
        service_address: ":8125"
        percentiles:
          - 50
          - 95
          - 99
        metric_separator: "_"
        allowed_pending_messages: 10000
        percentile_limit: 1000

# Lifecycle hooks
# hooks:
#   postStart: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "echo Telegraf started"]
#   preStop: ["/bin/sh", "-c", "sleep 60"]
